remarks: A particular coefficient of a subtraction.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 23-Mar-2015.)
statement:
coe1sub.y $e |- Y = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
coe1sub.b $e |- B = ( Base ` Y ) $.
coe1sub.p $e |- .- = ( -g ` Y ) $.
coe1sub.q $e |- N = ( -g ` R ) $.
coe1subfv $p |- ( ( ( R e. Ring /\ F e. B /\ G e. B ) /\ X e. NN0 ) -> ( ( coe1 ` ( F .- G ) ) ` X ) = ( ( ( coe1 ` F ) ` X ) N ( ( coe1 ` G ) ` X ) ) ) $.
